original_text: Amasa's dead body was lying in the road. His blood was all around it. All the soldiers who came there stopped when they saw the body. So the man pulled Amasa's dead body off the road into a field. He covered it with a cloth.
korean_text: 아마사가 길 가운데 피 속에 놓여 있는지라 그 청년이 모든 백성이 서 있는 것을 보고 아마사를 큰길에서부터 밭으로 옮겼으나 거기에 이르는 자도 다 멈추어 서는 것을 보고 옷을 그 위에 덮으니라

sentences.original_text: Amasa's dead body was lying in the road
sentences.korean_translation: 아마사의 죽은 시체가 길에 누워 있었다

sentences.original_text: His blood was all around it
All the soldiers who came there stopped
So the man pulled Amasa's dead body
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람은 아마사의 죽은 시체를 끌어냈다

sentences.original_text: off the road into a field
He covered it with a cloth
